## SeparatorFlyoutInflater.gapForItem() method

Returns the size of the separator. See `load` for more details.

**Signature:**

```typescript
gapForItem(state: object, defaultGap: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | object | A JSON representation of a flyout separator. |
|  defaultGap | number | The default spacing for flyout items. |

**Returns:**

number

The desired size of the separator.
